content: If you get the Buddha's Eyeballs and pop them into the rock _before_ you fight the Stone Vanguard, you can use the secret boss to your advantage. Put the Eyeballs into the rock to call on Shingdang, and let stone meet stone.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Secrets_in_Black_Myth_Wukong.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 2 Secrets', specifically from the subsection 'Shigandang Vs. Stone Vanguard'.
The content is as follows:
If you get the Buddha's Eyeballs and pop them into the rock _before_ you fight the Stone Vanguard, you can use the secret boss to your advantage. Put the Eyeballs into the rock to call on Shingdang, and let stone meet stone.
